title: Arcade minions
body:
How do I change arcade minions back to normal ones? 

The option on video settings to turn arcade off doesnt affect minions only map/turrets etc.

replies.body:
You can play ranked it has the normal minions. You could also just play Jungle or support so you don't have to last hit. 

I find the bright neon minions strain my eyes.
Yea it doesn't look like that option does turn off the minions. I'll reach out to some people to see if there's any chance we could get that feature updated!
